WORK

Daniel Fosco

This Site

A Jekyll-based playground

This website is my sandbox. Here I write whatever I feel like, use a bunch of flexbox and don’t give a single crap about IE.

It’s powered by Jekyll (I’m a huge nerd about it whenever I can) on Github Pages and uses the Bourbon & Neat Sass libraries.

Headings are set with Freight Sans Pro and body text with Proxima Nova via Typekit.

Twitter-style emoji comes courtesy of Twemoji-Awesome .

Lastly, you can take a look the embarassingly bad previous versions of my website. More bad versions will be added in the future, rest assured.

Talk to me on twitter @notdanielfosco.
